name: DESCO
description: Dhaka Electric Supply Company (DESCO) distributes electricity in parts of Dhaka city.

name: NESCO
description: Northern Electricity Supply Company (NESCO) provides power distribution in Rajshahi and Rangpur divisions.

name: WASA
description: WASA is responsible for supplying water and managing sewage services in urban areas.

name: TITAS
description: Titas Gas is the largest natural gas distributor in Bangladesh, serving residential and commercial customers.

name: PGCB
description: Power Grid Company of Bangladesh (PGCB) operates and maintains the national grid infrastructure.

name: DPDC
description: Dhaka Power Distribution Company (DPDC) is responsible for electricity distribution in central Dhaka and adjoining areas.
